pages.title: ! Commands
pages.text: Type these in the chat screen for instant actions (no AI processing):$(br2)$(bold)Movement$()$(br)$(thing)!follow$() — Switch to FOLLOW mode$(br)$(thing)!stay$() — Switch to STAY mode$(br)$(thing)!auto$() — Switch to AUTO mode$(br)$(thing)!come$() / $(thing)!here$() — Teleport companion to you$(br2)$(bold)Status & Tasks$()$(br)$(thing)!status$() — Show current task status$(br)$(thing)!cancel$() / $(thing)!stop$() — Cancel all tasks$(br)$(thing)!equip$() — Force re-equip best gear$(br)$(thing)!health$() / $(thing)!hp$() — Show health

pages.title: Chat & Help
pages.text: $(bold)Chat Control$()$(br)$(thing)shut up$() / $(thing)be quiet$() / $(thing)mute$() — Mute companion$(br)$(thing)talk again$() / $(thing)unmute$() — Unmute companion$(br2)$(bold)Help$()$(br)$(thing)!help$() / $(thing)?$() — Show command list$(br2)$(bold)Natural Language$()$(br)Simple commands like $(thing)"come here"$(), $(thing)"follow me"$(), $(thing)"craft a bucket"$() are parsed locally for instant response — no AI round-trip needed.
